channel.title: Advice plawkz
channel.description:
ok, i need advice
i got 72 atk, i need 75 for bgs. i got SS who know a GOOD place to get 75 atk fast?? im starting rs again and i need 75 atk, as i sad its 72.
im at PC now but its to easy, everyone is at novice boat.
and is there like a BOT for PC so i dont need to train myself.
please tips and tricks :)

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:8, topic:415422”]Each is useful in its own right. Except the ZGS, thats just completely pointless.

BGS is useful for bosses as it lowers defence.
AGS is useful for PKing as it has a stronger spec and works twice.
SGS is useful for PvM as it can restore HP and Prayer with two specs.
ZGS freezes… really? a melee weapon freezing? Pointless.[/quote]

I tend to use sgs when i’m low on food, although I don’t rely on it totally because it can miss. zgz, freezing, to me i think 2 things, 1. Noob rushers use it. 2. spec then fc, really zgz is for noobs.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“noobofiyer, post:14, topic:415422”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=517373.msg3758720#msg3758720 date=1316705936]
You could train on spiders on the third level of barb stronghold
[/quote]

is there a bot for it?[/quote]
Just use the epicbot auto fighter,

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I used an auto attack bot on the ogres on the island west of castle wars, did it fairly quick, 45k exp an hour. You have to check on it every 2 hours or so (depending on def level and how good your armour is), just in case it runs out of food, but it’s good there and it’s very rare that any one comes along.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:8, topic:415422”]Each is useful in its own right. Except the ZGS, thats just completely pointless.

BGS is useful for bosses as it lowers defence.
AGS is useful for PKing as it has a stronger spec and works twice.
SGS is useful for PvM as it can restore HP and Prayer with two specs.
ZGS freezes… really? a melee weapon freezing? Pointless.[/quote]

ZGS is good for some bosses.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Davidi2:

More like the AGS is overrated, the spec is shit but it has the same stats as all the other GS’s, and it costs 10 times as much

AGS isn’t overrated and it doesn’t costs 10 times as much as every other GS… My 72 owns with AGS spec.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Ags can be good for como’ing at low level >.>.
Use a whip and a defender, the bonus’s are higher than the ss’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @noobofiyer noobofiyer
item.description:
@noobofiyer wrote:

ill stick with SS, gettin 75 attack without a bot gonna take ages.Every bot stops for PC. :)\

thx guys

Read full topic

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

it’s all a matter of what you like, also it depends on the account using the G. Higher attack = more accuracy, Higher strength = more damage. I’d just stick with a Dscim or whip, but it’s w.e.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @noobofiyer noobofiyer

so shall i get BGS, cuz a 137 at PC sad bgs sucks SS is beter

@rip4d wrote:

Each is useful in its own right. Except the ZGS, thats just completely pointless.

BGS is useful for bosses as it lowers defence.
AGS is useful for PKing as it has a stronger spec and works twice.
SGS is useful for PvM as it can restore HP and Prayer with two specs.
ZGS freezes… really? a melee weapon freezing? Pointless.

item.title: Advice plawkz
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:415422”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=517373.msg3757944#msg3757944 date=1316638174]

just bot miniatours on the first level of barb. village stronghold, works great if you have a whip, also I would suggest you just keep the whip and forget about the bgs, they are overrated.

How can a bgs be overrated when there utter shite?
[/quote]
Thats what I mean, everyone thinks the bgs is so great! but there really not…[/quote]
Remember that all Gs’s are overrated. Once upon a time the Bgs was considered the best gs.
But in the grand scheme of things, its what the user uses for defines its effectiveness o.0.

Read full topic
